channel.title: Getting your No-IP online
channel.description:
I have a No-IP with the DUC program, and everything is working fine.
I have the 'runserver' on and can login to the server using 127.0.0.1
But - when I try to use Mortalscape.no-ip.info, it doesn't work. How can I get MortalScape.no-ip.info to work like 127.0.0.1 does when I have the 'runserver' on?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2007, 10:41:03 AM[/size][hr]Please, I really want to get it online.
What am I doing wrong? I have the DUC running with MortalScape.no-ip.info with a blushing face beside it.
I clicked on 'Runserver' and I can go on my server using 127.0.0.1 or 'localhost'.
But how come I can't get on my server using the No-IP I made, mortalscape.no-ip.info? I don't understand :[ [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Don't bump, read the rules. - The Un-Named[/center]

item.title: Getting your No-IP online

item.description:
@system wrote:

dude u urself on the same computer running the server canot log into ur serve rname u have to log into 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 ty!but ppl can log into ur server

item.title: Getting your No-IP online
item.dc:creator: @11130 ²
item.description:
@11130 wrote:

Okay thanks a lot.

Grr, my brother changed the user and password, and I don’t know what it is.

He’s at work for 2 more hours and he’ll get mad if I call him >:(

i can’t wait 2 hours :[

Read full topic

item.description:

eclipse245:

defaults are usually just admin for username or password and blank for username or password

It depends. Mine was “guest” and “guest”.

item.title: Getting your No-IP online
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“², post:5, topic:147373”]Grr, I probably am missing that step ;[

I don’t know the router username and password :([/quote]

Search for “-Your Router Model Here- default login” on google to try and find the “default login username/password”, or look on your router’s case, or in it’s book or ask your parents.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting your No-IP online
item.dc:creator: @11130 ²
item.description:
@11130 wrote:

I created a No-IP called MortalScape.no-ip.info on the No-IP website, and I have DUC 2.2.1.

It says MortalScape.no-ip.info and there is a face beside it blushing - which means its working and doesn’t need updates.

I open up my TestScape ‘runserver’ and it says: Starting server 0.0.0.0:43594 - so it’s running.

I can then login to the server on MoparScape using 127.0.0.1/Localhost although when I try mortalscape.no-ip.info it doesn’t work.

I just want to know why ;[

Read full topic

item.title: Getting your No-IP online
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Are you sure your hosting the server correctly?

Read full topic
